title: Evaluation metrics — evaluate_metrics
text: Evatueltion matrics several methods.

title: Evaluation metrics — evaluate_metrics
code: eva_ME(num_Sim, num_Obs)  eva_MAE(num_Sim, num_Obs)  eva_MSE(num_Sim, num_Obs)  eva_RMSE(num_Sim, num_Obs)  eva_R2(num_Sim, num_Obs)  eva_NSE(num_Sim, num_Obs)  eva_KGE(num_Sim, num_Obs, num_Scal = c(1, 1, 1))

title: Evaluation metrics — evaluate_metrics
text: num_Sim, num_Obs numeric vector simulated (\(S_i\)) observed (\(O_i\)) values. vectors must length. num_Scal numeric vector length 3 scaling factors r, alpha, beta eva_KGE calculation. Default c(1, 1, 1).

title: Evaluation metrics — evaluate_metrics
text: numeric value representing calculated error metric.

title: Evaluation metrics — evaluate_metrics
text: \[ \mathrm{} = \frac{1}{N} \sum_{=1}^N \left( S_i - O_i \right) \]

title: Evaluation metrics — evaluate_metrics
text: $$ \mathrm{MAE} = \frac{1}{N} \sum_{=1}^N \left| S_i - O_i \right| $$

title: Evaluation metrics — evaluate_metrics
text: $$ \mathrm{MSE} = \frac{1}{N} \sum_{=1}^N \left( S_i - O_i \right)^2 $$

title: Evaluation metrics — evaluate_metrics
text: $$ \mathrm{RMSE} = \sqrt{ \frac{1}{N} \sum_{=1}^N \left( S_i - O_i \right)^2 } $$

title: Evaluation metrics — evaluate_metrics
text: $$ R^2 = \frac{\left( \sum_{=1}^n (O_i - \bar{O})(S_i - \bar{S}) \right)^2}{\left( \sum_{=1}^n (O_i - \bar{O})^2 \right) \cdot \left( \sum_{=1}^n (S_i - \bar{S})^2 \right)} $$

title: Evaluation metrics — evaluate_metrics
text: $$ \mathrm{NSE} = 1 - \frac{ \sum_{=1}^N \left( S_i - O_i \right)^2 }{ \sum_{=1}^N \left( O_i - \bar{O} \right)^2 } $$

title: Evaluation metrics — evaluate_metrics
text: $$ \mathrm{KGE} = 1 - \mathrm{ED} $$ $$ \mathrm{ED} = \sqrt{ \left( s[1](r-1) \right)^2 + \left( s[2](\alpha-1) \right)^2 + \left( s[3](\beta-1) \right)^2 } $$ $$ r = \frac{\text{cov}(S, O)}{\sigma_s \sigma_o} $$ $$ \alpha = \frac{\sigma_s}{\sigma_o} $$ $$ \beta = \frac{\mu_s}{\mu_o} $$

title: Evaluation metrics — evaluate_metrics
code: sim <- rnorm(100) obs <- rnorm(100) eva_ME(sim, obs) #> [1] -0.0440676 eva_MAE(sim, obs) #> [1] 1.189457 eva_MSE(sim, obs) #> [1] 2.170289 eva_RMSE(sim, obs) #> [1] 1.47319 eva_R2(sim, obs) #> [1] 0.0007170596 eva_NSE(sim, obs) #> [1] -1.130922 eva_KGE(sim, obs) #> [1] -0.0967146

Find a specific GCRC location within a continent — find_gcrc_location
text: str_Continent string, must one "eu" (Europe), "af" (Africa), "" (Asia), "au" (Australia), "na" (North America), "sa" (South America). id_GCRC integer, ID GCRC within specified continent

title: Find a specific GCRC location within a continent — find_gcrc_location
code: # Example usage: # Assuming lst_GCRC is a list containing information of GCRCs indexed by continent, # and we want to retrieve the information of GCRC with ID 1 in continent "eu" (Europe): # find_gcrc_location("eu", 1)

title: Hydrological models — model
text: Q_In (vector) Inflow Boundary condition (Forcing) data Q_Out0 (num) Innitial condition, Outflow first timepoint, DEFAULT 0 param_K (num) Parameter K linear reservoir method

title: Hydrological models — model
text: Outflow (vector)

title: Hydrological models — model
text: Linear Reservoir method just assuming watershed behaves like linear reservoir, outflow proportional water storage within reservoir. \[Q_{} = \frac{1}{K}S(t)\] addition relationship output storage, linear reservoir models also adhere continuity equation, often referred water balance equation. \[\frac{\mathrm{d}S(t)}{\mathrm{d}t} = Q_{} - Q_{}\] combining equations, obtain differential equation (DGL). \[Q_{} = Q_{} + K\frac{\mathrm{d}Q_{}(t)}{\mathrm{d}t}\] \[Q_{}(t)=\int_{\tau=t0}^{t}Q_{}(\tau)\frac{1}{K}e^{-\frac{t-\tau}{K}}\mathrm{d}\tau + Q_{}(t_0)\frac{1}{K}e^{-\frac{t-t0}{K}}\] : \(Q_{}\) inflow reservoir \(Q_{}\) outflow reservoir \(S\) storage reservoir \(K\) parameter defines relationship $Q_out$ $S$
